subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Iowa State has long been a forlorn way station for coaches, but it looks as if it has found a keeper in Paul Rhoads, especially after signing him to a 10-year, $20 million contract extension.
snippet: Iowa State has long been a forlorn way station for coaches, but it looks as if it has found a keeper in Paul Rhoads, especially after signing him to a 10-year, $20 million contract extension.
